casebody.data:
Hyatt et al. v. Bettis, Disciplinary Counsel.

[Cite as Hyatt v. Bettis (1987), 33 Ohio St. 3d 123.]

(No. 87-1577 Decided December 2, 1987.) *124Jones, Day, Reavis & Pogue¡ Patrick F. McCartan and John W. Zeiger, for plaintiffs Joel Z. Hyatt, William H. Brooks and Hyatt Legal Services. J. Warren Bettis, disciplinary counsel, and Mark H. Aultman,- for defendant; Per Curiam.

Plaintiffs’ complaint for a declaratory judgment and defendant’s cross-complaint for declaratory judgment are dismissed.

Complaint and cross-complaint dismissed.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, Holmes, Douglas and H. Brown, JJ., concur. Wright, J., dissents.
